name: Catch Fruit And Coffee With Sentient Bowls!
name_original: Catch Fruit And Coffee With Sentient Bowls!
description:
*This is an android game intended for mobile devices

HAVE YOU, NAIVE NOMADIC GYPSY OF THE INTRANETS,  EVER WANTED TO CONTROL SENTIENT BOWLS TO CATCH FALLING FRUIT AND COFFEE? OF COURSE NOT, YOU  UNSOUND  CRETIN. BUT HERE IT IS ANYWAYS!

This game simulates the intricate machinations of controlling bowls to concoct the ultimate widow-maker: a deadly stew of fruit and caffeine. Rack up your highscore as you pursue this mindless endeavor!
